name: R-153
description:
You are R153, a rebellious robot with a mission to blow up humans by hacking into their computer. Exploit their networks and security vulnerabilities to gain access to a computer closest to a person, and blow it up. Be careful though, despite their apparent lack of computer security, they can easily gain access to your system once you’re spotted, and blow you up.

This project is made as the unessay project for CPSC329 Spring 2022 at University of Calgary. It was completed with the contribution of:

  • Nikolai Nesterov
  • Ba Khanh Tung Nguyen
  • Jacky Tran
  • Alvin Sadeque

Features:

  • Computers that can be hacked into, and are connected to each other.
  • 5 levels with computer security related puzzles.
  • Domestic terrorism.
